#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
//int main is the main fuction with int as the return value

int main()
{
    int n;
    scanf("%d",&n);
    int a[n][n];
    memset(a,0,sizeof(a));
    int i,j,k,c=0,m=n*n;
    if(n%2==1)
    {
        while(m>0)
            {
            for(i=n-c-1;i>=c;i--)
            a[n-c-1][i]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=n-c-2;i>=c;i--)
            a[i][c]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=c+1;i<=n-c-1;i++)
            a[c][i]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=c+1;i<n-c-1;i++)
        a[i][n-c-1]=m--;
        c++;
 
        }
    }
    else
    {
        while(m>0)
        {
            for(i=c;i<=n-c-1;i++)
            a[c][i]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=c+1;i<=n-c-1;i++)
            a[i][n-c-1]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=n-c-2;i>=c;i--)
            a[n-c-1][i]=m--;
            if(m<=0)
            break;
            for(i=n-c-2;i>c;i--)
            a[i][c]=m--;
            c++;
 
        }
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
        printf("\n");
        for(j=0;j<n;j++)
        printf("%d\t",a[i][j]);
 
    }
    return 0;
}
